version_description:
We added FOUR new blocks! Youtube, Vimeo, Soundcloud, and Giphy. The internet is your palette:

You can now add any video, track, or GIF to your site super easily. Search is instant and infinite.

We can't wait to see what you build!

We might blow your mind on this one. You can now *change the resolution* of the grid. In addition to the classic 3-up, you can now go 4 or 5 blocks wide.

What this means in practice: you get way more room for blocks. With the 3-up grid, you can put 18 blocks on a single screen. With the 5-up, you can add 50.

We're psyched to see what you do with this.

:)

We redesigned the photo and video blocks to be way faster. Palettes now show your whole library, so there's no need to go digging in and out of your camera roll each time you add a block.

Also, photos will now expand on the web when they're tapped, making it super easy to create a portfolio or gallery.

Enjoy!

Your site’s dashboard is now the app’s home screen. We also added a quick + at the bottom to create a new post. If you have more than one site, tap on “Sites” on the top left to see all of your sites.
Fixed a bug in the Magic Builder
Fixes and tweaks
Quick bug fix

Bought a domain from Godaddy, Hover, or anywhere else? You can now use it with your Universe site. Just tap “Upgrade domain” and then “Already own a domain?”. We’ve streamlined the process to make it as painless as possible. Enjoy!

Bought a domain from Godaddy, Hover, or anywhere else? You can now use it with your Universe site. Just tap “Upgrade domain” and then “Already own a domain?”. We’ve streamlined the process to make it as painless as possible. Enjoy!

Bought a domain from Godaddy, Hover, or anywhere else? You can now use it with your Universe site. Just tap “Upgrade domain” and then “Already own a domain?”. We’ve streamlined the process to make it as painless as possible. Enjoy!
Bug fixes and polish
Some more fixes and polish.

COPY and PASTE. You can now duplicate blocks anywhere on the grid. And it's way more fun than you'd think. To copy, just long-press on a block. To paste, just tap on an empty space on the grid. Enjoy!
Under the hood improvements

Add rows anywhere on your grid! Just long-press on a block to add a row above it. This is awesome because you can now add content to the top of your sites super easily.

We're making the grid more powerful and more fluid. If you move a 1x1 block to a space that already has a block, it will move out of the way. And you can now long-press to delete any block.

Enjoy!

1-tap sharing to Instagram! You can now share a snapshot of your site super easily. After making a change to your site, just tap the Instagram icon. From there you can share it to Stories or as a post. Make sure to tag it with #onuniverse!

We also added two awesome new business filters—Studio and Topo.

Enjoy!

Introducing Universe Pro, which unifies all of our paid subscriptions into one simple offering. As a Pro member, you'll get a custom domain, site analytics, and the option to remove Universe branding. Perhaps most excitingly, you'll get access to new premium features as we build them.

If you love Universe, we hope you sign up. Over time, Pro will get better and better.

Introducing the Payment Block! You can now accept payments on your site super easily with Paypal.me and Square Cash. People who visit your site can just "Slide to Pay." It's really cool :)

We're introducing the Payment Block as our first new Pro feature.

Enjoy!

Snapchat sharing! Here's how it works: after publishing a site, choose the Snapchat icon. Snapchat will open to a new snap with your screenshot as a sticker and your site's URL will be automatically attached to your snap, so your friends can just swipe up to see your site. This is going to be really fun. Enjoy!
Quick fix for the Vimeo block

You can now add a favicon to your site! That's the little icon that shows up next to your site's name in a browser tab. Pick from 25  Universe-designed icons to match your site. Want to request an icon? Shoot us a message in the app! We'll see what we can do :)

This update brings a quick bug fix for 1.27.0:

You can now add a favicon to your site! That's the little icon that shows up next to your site's name in a browser tab. Pick from 25 Universe-designed icons to match your site. Want to request an icon? Shoot us a message in the app! We'll see what we can

We made a bunch of improvements under the hood to handle sites with lots of blocks much better. While adding new features is great, it's important to make sure we're updating the app's foundation as we expand what's possible with sites. This will help us make sure Universe stays reliable and snappy as we grow :)

More soon!

1.28.1 is a quick patch to fix a couple of bugs.

We completely redesigned our first-time user experience. Now, we expose our grid upfront—while still guiding users to make a site in seconds. We think it captures what makes Universe special, and we can't wait to see how newcomers react to it.

We completely redesigned our first-time user experience. Now, we expose our grid upfront—while still guiding users to make a site in seconds. We think it captures what makes Universe special, and we can't wait to see how newcomers react to it.

This update includes a quick bug fix

We're back with another new Pro feature. This one's pretty great: you can now create a custom email address with your domain. We'll forward emails that your custom email receives to your personal address. Head over to your site dashboard to get started.

Questions or comments? We now have a subreddit for you to connect with us and share feedback. Check it out and say hello! https://reddit.com/r/onuniverse

What if websites were more like magazines and less like business cards? Until now, sites have scrolled. Now they swipe.

We're introducing a whole new format for sites called Timeline.

With timeline, your site becomes a swipable magazine with the full power of our grid on every page. Timeline adds another dimension to Universe: instead of telling your story over a single page, expand it over time.

We think it's the most powerful and exciting way to share your life, showcase your portfolio, and highlight your products on the internet. It transforms your site from a static page with a few tabs into one that you can update every day.

You already know how it works. Just create a new page. When you're done, that page will automatically be added to your timeline. When someone visits your site, they just swipe to browse the newest pages. You can have as many pages as you want.

We see this as something like a 2018 version of blogging. It's mobile, visual, interactive, and fundamentally open-ended—because it's built on our grid. Every block and every feature of the grid is instantly available every time you want to post. And these pages are not land-locked to a particular social network; they're on the web with a URL. So you can share them anywhere.

In building our tools, we've learned to expect the unexpected. That's very much the case here.

We can't wait to see what you create.
We're bringing themes into the grid. With this update, you can apply a theme directly in our editor—and you can switch between them with one tap. We'll continue to add more themes over time. Enjoy :)
We're bringing themes into the grid. With this update, you can apply a theme directly in our editor—and you can switch between them with one tap. We'll continue to add more themes over time. Enjoy :)

You can now make a store on Universe :)

We're partnering with Shopify to bring commerce to Universe. It's as simple as you'd expect. As a Pro customer, start selling by simply adding the Shopify block to your site. From there you'll be able to choose any product from your inventory.

Because it's all built on the grid, you can design your storefront exactly how you want.

We have a feeling that business on the internet is about to get a lot more interesting. Now, go make some $$$.

Fixes for iOS 12

Introducing Apps We Love, a new section that features awesome tools that pair well with Universe. Here you’ll find apps to make your sites even better, from photo editors to handy utilities. We’ll add more over time, so make sure to check in frequently!

Steve was getting fussy, so we added a fresh new batch of fonts, colors, and themes to the editor. 10 new themes, 5 new fonts, and 19 new colors to be exact. Head over to the grid and check them out!

Also: we updated the new user experience to include a step for getting a domain without leaving the editor.

Enjoy!

Big update. You can now collect email addresses on your site! Meet the subscribe block, the easiest way to build an audience on the web. Simply add it to your site to start building your list. It's available to all Universe sites for free :)

To share an update with your audience, just add a new page to your timeline. All of your subscribers will get it via email.

We're adding a new dimension to Universe—a way for anyone on the web to follow to keep tabs on the people, creators, and businesses they love. This is new territory for us. Check it out and let us know what you think.

We redesigned the site dashboard to make managing your website much easier, clearer, and more beautiful. Each control is now a modular tile, with relevant info available at a glance. We also made it easier to create a new tab: just tap +Tab next to Home.

Enjoy!

We created an all new experience for learning about Pro. Instead of a bulleted list, the Pro screen now details all of the features included with beautiful images and videos.

Our gallery page got an update as well. We were using a third-party service before, but now it's made with Universe :) Head over to showcase.onuniverse.com and check out some amazing sites built by our creators.
Bug fixes!

It’s here. Universe 2.0, the most powerful website builder on iPhone is coming to iPad. It’s the same drag and drop grid editor perfectly scaled for larger displays for an immersive editing experience that’ll keep you smiling for days.

There’s also an all new guided experience we’ve added to help you create your website and learn all about editing your site.

You finally have reason to buy that new iPad you’ve had your eyes on ;)

Follow us on dispatch.onuniverse.com and @onuniverse on Instagram and Twitter for more!

Now that Universe for iPad is out, we're back at it with a sweet new update this week. You can now duplicate any page on your site! Use it to create templates, to keep a “blog” or magazine, or anything else you can imagine. Just tap and hold on a page from your site dashboard and you'll see the option to duplicate (and delete) a page.

We also took this week to get some bug fixes and small updates into the app. (It was Patrick's birthday, so we had to make sure he had something to do.)

The details:

• We fixed a bug that caused the Universe sticker to show occasionally on Pro sites even when if it was hidden
• Creating a new page will now preserve the site theme and grid settings
• If a page is created in the editor, the dashboard will now show the page when you return to it
• Fixed external domain instructions being cut off when setting up an external domain
• Fixed text alignment resetting and general wonkiness with the text block
• Adding a phone number through the guided creator journey now works
• If you already have a custom domain, that step in the creator journey will be accomplished
• Updated launch screen logo with new icon colors
• Fixed a bug that caused the app to lock up when a block was copied in the editor
• Fixed a bug that sometimes caused a crash when changing sites
• Fixed a bug that caused the app to crash after changing your domain name
• Fixed a bug that cause fonts to changed when you resized text with emojis

Enjoy!

About a month ago, we released the subscribe block, making it possible for you to build an email list and grow an audience through your site. With this release, you can now choose when subscribers get email updates. And Pro customers can now see their list of subscribers and send them custom emails right from the app.

We also added some updates to the new user experience. See if you can find them ;)

Happy Thanksgiving!

This week we’re adding 23 (!) new icons to the link block. These include a bunch of missing services (Reddit, Tiktok) as well as some fun new ones that are open to interpretation.

Other updates in this release include:

• A new notification banner that lets you know when there’s an issue with your subscription so you can make any necessary corrections to your billing

• A new form to help us collect feedback from people if they decide to delete their site

Enjoy!

We've got a great new update and style pack for you as we make our way to the new year. You can now pick where you want your page to show up on your site after you create a new page. This makes it wayyy easier to set up your site just the way you like. Pick between adding a page directly to your site menu, timeline, or hide the page and make it only accessible via direct link.

To top it all off, there are 4 new themes and 3 new fonts carefully curated by Santa's favorite helper, the real Steve. Open up a fresh new page for your site and have some fun with them, they're pretty great :)

That's it for this week. Until next time <3

What can you do with Universe? Create a blog, setup a store, share your life, connect with your fans, tell your story.

Now, we help you unlock these possibilities whenever you create a new page.

The new creation menu provides a handful of starting points so you can worry less about layout and just get your word out. Tap the + button to get started!

What can you do with Universe? Create a blog, setup a store, share your life, connect with your fans, tell your story.
But with a blank canvas, it's hard to know where to begin. Now we'll help you get started with purpose-built layouts for blog posts, photo galleries, announcements, about pages, and more.

Just tap the + button to get started!

Big or small, building a website is a journey. Learn how to do more with your site through an all-new guided experience that helps you level up your website step by step. Start with the basics and work your way up to more advanced features. You'll find a new shiny blue tile on your dashboard on your site dashboard to get started.

Try it out and see where it takes you :)

2018 was a huge year for us. We set out to make it easier than ever for anyone and everyone to build the internet, and 225,000+ websites later, we couldn't be more excited about what we've accomplished. A big thank you for joining us on this journey. We're just getting started.

This week's release includes a test of our onboarding flow that includes homepage designs, making it easier to get started building your site.

Lots more to come in 2019. Until then!
New year. New website. We're running a special offer to open 2019: Pro is 50% off when you sign up for an annual plan. Limited time offer until January 31. Take your site to the next level!

This week, we welcome Michael, our first web-focused engineer. This means that you can expect your sites to load faster, show up higher in search engines, and other general improvements across the board. Give him a shout at michaelaldridge.onuniverse.com!

We also updated the creator journey to be more reliable and flexible. Tap the 'Keep Building' tile on your site dashboard to explore cool things you can do with Universe to level up your site.

The wait is over! All Universe sites and domain now include HTTPS / TLS protection. This means that your site will be recognized by search engines and browsers as secure, insuring that it shows up in searches and can be visited safely by everyone (no more "unsecure" warnings on your site).

TLS protection is included at no extra cost for all Universe subdomains, custom domains, and external domains purchased elsewhere.

Stay safe!

Up until now, Universe has been a "single-player" experience: the best tool to build your site. But we've found that the greatest inspiration often comes from interacting with other creators. Today we're introducing the Universe network: a new kind of community designed to inspire and empower.

Just like we've built our creation tool iteratively, week-over-week, we're going to build the network out the same way—step-by-step, with you all. This week's release is the first in a series of updates that will follow in the coming weeks and months.

To start, you'll notice the Explore tab got an overhaul. We updated Discover to showcase the most interesting sites on the network. And we added a new tab: Following. Updates—new pages, edits—from all the sites you follow will show up here.

This is an opportunity to build a new kind of social network, one that isn't powered by ads, incentivized to exploit your time, or creatively homogeneous. This is a network that turns the web into a community.

We've added an all-new help center into the grid editor, so now you can learn the basics, discover tips and tricks, and explore new features—all while creating your site. Tap on the little '?' icon in the top-right corner of the grid and check it out. You might learn something new ;)

This one is big. You can now search the entire Universe network, view any site, and follow it right from the app. It's amazing—you can get lost in it for days.

Open the explore tab and you'll find the new search icon right next to your feed. Search by name, domain, and subdomain, or if you're in the mood to wander, try searching by genre: store, musician, blog, portfolio, personal, business, etc. It's a totally new way to surf the web.

Don't forget that others can now find you too! Tell your friends, share across other networks, or tell a total stranger—the Universe network is now open for exploration.

Wouldn't it be great to see who follows you? Well, now you can. Tap on the followers tile on your site dashboard and see the sites from people who follow you.

You can also see all the sites that *you* follow by tapping the little icon at the top left-hand corner of your feed now. Oh, and you can now unfollow sites—just long press.

Some other things we snuck in with this release:

- A loading state for search
- Bug fix that caused some people to get stuck in onboarding
- Bug fix for setting up a custom email address

Introducing templates! Universe now includes over 20 professionally designed templates to help you make the site of your dreams. The process for getting started couldn't be easier: just create a new site and follow the guided instructions. Of course, once your site is up and running you can edit it freely on the grid.

We're running this as a test in our new user experience, but if you want to give templates a try, anyone can create a second site for free and take them for a spin :)

And if you just want to apply the style from these templates to your existing sites, you're in luck. We've added 11 beautiful new themes, all for free.

Enjoy!

See something you like in your feed? Show it some love with our new likes! Tap the heart as many times as you'd like to show you really care :)

And when someone likes *your* updates, you'll get a new notification. We added a new notification center to the top right of the dashboard, where all of your likes will show up.

Also in this release:

- A new card-based design for the feed
- Relocated App Info / Settings menu to the bottom of the dashboard

Now, go spread the love!

If you haven’t tried Pro, take it for a spin with a free 7 day trial. It's like fine wine—only gets better with age.

This is a patch update that fixes video playback on Pro How Tos

Say hello to the gallery block, an awesome new way to upload multiple photos with customizable layouts. Use it to make albums, build recipe books, sell your products and so much more. There are six different layouts to choose from, each one interactive in a unique way. Give them a try and let us know what you think :) Enjoy!

Lights, camera, action. You can now instantly upload videos to your Universe site—and it couldn't be easier. Just add a video block and we'll handle the rest. You can add as many 4 minute videos as you want. For free.

This is the one place on the internet where your videos can live without ads, without branding from YouTube or Vimeo, and without "recommended videos" by others. It's your theater. Design it your way.

This week brings a nice update to the gallery block: you can now import your Instagram photos! Just create a new gallery block, choose to add from Instagram, and enter your username.

We also fixed a bug with the video block that was causing a crash and made updates to our onboarding experience.

More soon!

We added 6 slick new page templates to help you build out your site: portfolio, discography, contact, event, filmography, and shop. You can think of pages as the building blocks to your site. Use them to tell your story, share your work, and connect with your audience. To try them out, just tap that big ol' plus button on your site dashboard.

Pro Tip: Apply themes at the bottom of the grid to add even more flavor to the page templates.

You now have the option to choose how you’d like to create a subsequent site. Pick between creating a site with your Instagram account, using a site template, or starting from scratch. You get to decide.

The text block now automatically expands as you type to keep text from overflowing in the block. So whether you're writing a blog post or adding some lengthy product descriptions, the text will always look just right on your site.
Small fixes!
More small fixes!

We're back. Introducing Universe 3, a major update that brings a whole new look to the app along with an overhaul of its foundation. It sets the stage for the weeks, months, and years to come.

Believe it or not, when we first launched Universe it was a single-page site builder (and those sites didn't even scroll!). But what we heard from our creators was that they wanted to create more. The problem is that, at its core, our app wasn't designed to support a site with many pages, so simple things like reordering pages became nearly impossible.

We pushed forward as much as we could, and then about a couple of months ago we decided to commit to re-architecting the app to enable multi-page site creation in the best way possible. Going from shipping new updates every week to being heads-down on a long term project was a huge investment for us, but these upgrades are going to unlock a new wave of possibilities.

It's best to look at Universe 3 as a new *chassis* for the app, both the front-facing parts and the underlying technology that supports it. Today's update is just the beginning. To start, you can now add multiple pages to any tab on your site instead of just the homepage. As one of our top requests, this will let you create all kinds of new blogs and websites. There's a lot more that will follow in the weeks ahead as we shift back to our regular cadence.

Whether you're a new creator or someone who's been with us since the beginning, thanks for all your support and feedback. Your enthusiasm, creativity, and ideas fuel us. We're building a new web together—one that *everyone* creates—and this a leap forward along that path. We can't wait to see what you create next.

3.3.1 is a patch release with a couple of fixes.

First you could swipe, now you can scroll. Today we're adding the ability to change the way pages display on your site.

With timeline, we brought swiping to Universe sites. This made it possible to create things you could never easily create on the web: digital magazines, portfolios, journals, and lots more.

Today we're giving you choice in how your pages display. Instead of just swiping, you can now scroll through your pages. This lets you make a more traditional blog, and it opens up space for new forms of storytelling.

Controlling how pages flow is as easy as flipping a switch. Head over to your Pages tab, and you'll find the Presentation Style control at the bottom of your list of pages.

Create an infinite number of pages, reorder them any way you like, and choose how you display them on your site.

Today we're introducing a brand new section to the app: the Home tab. It's a one-stop shop to see what's new, learn more about Universe, and quickly access your recent pages. Just tap on one of your sites to check it out.

We've been thinking a lot about how we can best educate, inform, and inspire creators directly in the app, and this is our first step. We'll keep it up to date with new content and features, so make sure to check back in frequently. See you there!

We redesigned the Pages tab to be clearer, more intuitive, and easier to use.

Over the past month, we've unlocked what you can do with pages: add them anywhere, reorder them, and customize how they're navigated. Today's update presents all of those controls in one beautiful and simple interface.

We also fixed a bunch of bugs to make things run smoother for everyone.

This patch release includes a few bug fixes:
1. Changing your URL will now update on all tabs
2. You can set any page as your homepage by tapping the gear icon its detail page
3. Fixed a crash for some pages with many subpages
4. Edits made on the Pages tab are now reflected on the Home tab

Summer’s not over yet. Say hello to our summer theme collection: 17 beautiful new designs with new layouts, fonts, and colors. Try them out!

We also added a bunch of fixes and tweaks:
- When you make a new site, the theme you choose will now apply to all subsequent pages
- On iPad, there's now a dividing line between your pages and their detail view
- Fixed a bug where tapping to customize your domain would throw an error
- Fixed a bug where images would expand on-tap regardless of whether they were set to
- some other new hidden features for eagle-eyed followers :)

This week is all about pages. We added a handful of much-requested updates to make creating, moving, and linking to pages a whole lot easier.

Here's what's new:

- You can now move pages between sections on your site. Just tap the settings icon on any subpage and choose where you want it to go.
- It's now possible to link to other pages on your site now from inside the grid editor. Select a block, tap the Link tab of the palette, and choose your destination.
- We also added a handy button for creating new pages from the home tab. Just tap the +, choose your page type, and pick where you want it to go.

We also added a bunch of tweaks and fixes:

- Rotating your iPad no longer sometimes shows a funky blank space to the right
- Text scaling with themes works correctly now on iPad
- Support chats opened from notifications now open properly and 'contact us' buttons now open to the list of chats if you have an existing chat open
- Patreon link blocks now accept URLs instead of usernames

God said, "let there be light" and, in that moment, it was decided that all of man wanted darkness. Say hello to dark mode for Universe. We updated the app and editor to fully support iOS 13. Turn off the lights and go have some fun.

Two things!

1. You can now hide top-level pages and all of their subpages. Just tap the gear icon on the page you want to hide.

2. We revamped the experience for setting up domains from other registrars (companies like Godaddy, Namecheap). Now, tapping on your domain from Settings will bring up a beautiful control panel, show your domain’s status, and help you get set up.

Enjoy!

Sometimes things just click. Meet the all-new button block: design, style, and—for the first time—animate any kind of button for your site. Sell your products, drive sign ups, and add a little magic to those clicks. It's the little things.

We added call and email actions to the button block, so that your visitors can get in touch super easily. With that, we updated the design of the action tab in palettes (formerly the link tab) to support an expanding menu of options. These actions are available on any block, not just the button block, which means that any piece of text, photo, or GIF is programmable. Some big updates to the app this week. We're making some changes to what's included in the free and Pro version of the app. Moving forward, all free sites will be limited to using the text and image blocks (which still let you create a killer website). This doesn't apply to existing sites. You'll still be able to edit all the blocks on your site.

Why are we doing this?

Universe has evolved tremendously over the past year. And our customers have evolved too. We've grown from being a simple landing page builder to the most powerful web-design tool ever made for mobile. Our customers rely on Universe to make their livelihood and build their businesses, and we want to invest in helping them in the best way possible. This makes Pro more valuable to our customers and it gives us the resources to build everything they need. Win, win.
This update introduces a special offer for longtime creators and allows existing blocks to be edited freely.

A bunch of updates to our onboarding flow: Pro templates, ability to go back and forth, a bunch more specific archetypes (with pretty new icons). We also fixed some text issues: font sizes and weights are preserved between themes, bold button stays properly selected, and emojis now work properly.

Pro themes, promo code support, and a handful of bug fixes. 

The fixes:
- Text shadows now work properly
- Duplicating a page now includes the right name
- Video uploads won’t incorrectly cancel in some situations

We updated the text block, making it easier to edit large amounts of text. Now, when you tap a block to edit it, it won’t scroll to the bottom of your text—the cursor will be placed exactly where you tapped. There a bunch of technical stuff under the hood, but in the end it all feels exactly like it should.

Pro tip: while editing text, hold the space bar. You can move your cursor around anywhere for quick editing. If you move it to the top or bottom of your text, your canvas will scroll along with it. It’s a major improvement to working with text.

Also: we updated the Pro tab to include our latest styles, fixed a bug with emojis not saving properly, and hit a few other small fixes.

Did you know that you could pull down on your site dashboard to see all of your sites? Turns out a lot of people missed that. We added a label to make it clearer and fixed some other bugs.

The grid got a little more magical this week. We made some upgrades that should make setting up your pages and adding content way more fun:

- It's here: You can now add rows to the top of the grid. Simply pull down on the page like you would refresh and you'll magically see a new row appear. We gave the guy who made it a promotion.

- So you got a little excited and added too many rows. No worries, you can select empty rows anywhere on your page and delete them now too! Simply draw on the grid to select the row(s) you want to delete, and you'll see a new 'delete row' button.

- You can now paste links directly into Youtube, Soundcloud, and Giphy blocks to embed the exact content you want onto your site. No more feeling like a crazy person trying to find your content through search.

Just like last time, more surprises on the way.

This one's big. Introducing product and inventory management—the fastest and easiest way to create products, add inventory, and sell online. We gave the payment block a complete makeover to simplify the store creation process and give you better tools to sell.

• The payment block has been updated to help you create products
• When you create products, you can now add variations like size and color
• Each variation can have its own price so it's easier to sell things like quantities or sizes at different price points
• Products now have support for inventory so you can add stock for each item and automatically track supply as orders come in
• The checkout system has been updated to make it easy for your customers to see what's in stock and buy the exact product they're looking for

These tools add powerful new abilities to help you sell online and, best of all, they're available to everyone for free. Try adding the payment block to your site and take it for a spin. Enjoy!

Say goodbye to waiting in line at the post office to ship your products. Introducing Universe Shipping—create shipping labels, get the best rates, and pay for postage all without needing to leaving the app.

Just tap on an order from your dashboard to create UPS and USPS labels. To make things even easier, labels are paid for seamlessly from your account's balance.

With Universe Shipping, we're taking another step towards setting up and managing your online business as easy and smooth as possible. We think you're going to love it.

In addition to Shipping, we made some other great improvements to the selling experience:

- You can now collect a phone number with your orders
- You can now add a notes field to your orders to collect info from your customers
- Your customers can now order more than one of a specific item from the checkout screen

Note: Universe Shipping is only available to sellers and purchasers in the US at launch.

You know what they say... teamwork makes the dream work. Starting today, you can invite other people to edit and manage sites on Universe with Shared Sites.

Getting started is easy. Head over to the Settings tab from your site dashboard. When you invite a new collaborator we will generate a one time use code for you to share with them however you'd like. When you share it we'll include a link with instructions for your new collaborator to get started. You'll need a Universe Pro subscription to invite collaborators to your site.

Meet the Download Block. Whether you make videos, zines, mixes, or anything in between, you can now sell (or give away) whatever you make as a digital file.

To get started, just add the Download Block to your site, upload your PDF, MP3, MOV, or any other file type, and name your price. Then you can start selling right away—with no shipping or overhead required.

Paid downloads are a great way to expand your online store, but you can also offer files for free. We can’t wait to see what you create, upload, and sell.
